name: follicular fluid
description: The fluid surrounding the ovum and granulosa cells in the ovarian follicle.

name: amniotic fluid
description: Amniotic fluid is a bodily fluid consisting of watery liquid surrounding and cushioning a growing fetus within the amnion. It allows the fetus to move freely without the walls of the uterus being too tight against its body. Buoyancy is also provided. The composition of the fluid changes over the course of gestation. Initially, amniotic fluid is similar to maternal plasma, mainly water with electrolytes. As the fetus develops, proteins, carbohydrates, lipids, phospholipids originating from the lungs, fetal cells, and urea are deposited in the fluid.

name: blood
description: A fluid that is composed of blood plasma and erythrocytes.

name: interstitial fluid
description: Interstitial fluid is a bodily fluid consisting of a solution which bathes and surrounds the cells of multicellular animals. It is the main component of the extracellular fluid, which also includes plasma and transcellular fluid.

name: urine
description: Excretion that is the output of a kidney.

name: sweat
description: Secretion produced by a sweat gland.

name: peritoneal fluid
description: Transudate contained in the peritoneal cavity.

name: cerebrospinal fluid
description: A clear, colorless, bodily fluid, that occupies the subarachnoid space and the ventricular system around and inside the brain and spinal cord.

name: aqueous humor of eyeball
description: A thick watery refractive medium that fills the space between the lens and the cornea.

name: saliva
description: A fluid produced in the oral cavity by salivary glands, typically used in predigestion, but also in other functions.

name: milk
description: An emulsion of fat globules within a fluid that is secreted by the mammary gland during lactation.

name: blood plasma
description: The liquid component of blood, in which erythrocytes are suspended.
synonyms: ["blood plasm","plasma","portion of blood plasma","portion of plasma"]

name: blood serum
description: The portion of blood plasma that excludes clotting factors.

name: feces
description: Portion of semisolid bodily waste discharged through the anus.
synonyms: ["excreta","faeces","fecal material","fecal matter","piece of shit","portion of excrement","portion of faeces","portion of fecal material","portion of fecal matter","portion of feces","portionem cacas","stool"]

name: seminal fluid
description: A substance formed from the secretion of one or more glands of the male genital tract in which sperm cells are suspended.

name: sputum
description: Matter ejected from the lungs, bronchi, and trachea, through the mouth.

name: tear film
description: An aqueous substance that covers the anterior surface of the eyeball, keeping the cornea wet.
